They reported that boa constrictors can actually

scientists attached metal markers to two of

one a third of the way down their body, and

When the cuff was placed higher up on the
boa’s body,

its lower ribs would expand to let air into
the lungs.

it would breathe with its upper ribs.

As the boa swallowed its prey, the part of
the rib cage it used shifted
as dinner moved down the digestive tract.

The researchers suggest that boas couldn’t
have evolved the ability to constrict prey
